summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 6, Pettit's University Addition, being the alley from East 50th Street to East 53rd Street, between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 110340 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
